Property.name: OfficialName
Property.val: ADRENAL GLAND: Biopsy (Core Needle, Incisional, Excisional); Resection

Property.name: Restrictions
Property.val: Protocol applies to adrenal cortical carcinoma only. Cortical adenomas, pheochromocytoma, neuroblastic tumors, and adrenal tumors of childhood are not included.

ListItem.title: Urinary 17-ketosteroids increased (10 mg / g creatinine / 24 hours)

Section.title: Additional dimensions (repeat section if more than one part)

Question.title: Treatment Effect (applicable to carcinomas treated with neoadjuvant therapy)

ListItem.title: pTX: Primary tumor cannot be assessed
pT0: No evidence of primary tumor
pT1: Tumor <= 5 cm in greatest dimension, no extra-adrenal invasion
pT2: Tumor > 5 cm, no extra-adrenal invasion
pT3: Tumor of any size with local invasion but not invading adjacent organs
pT4: Tumor of any size that invades adjacent organs (kidney, diaphragm, pancreas, spleen, or liver) or large blood vessels (renal vein or vena cava)
pNX: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed
pN0: No regional lymph node metastasis
pN1: Metastasis in regional lymph node(s)
?Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)
